name: 01 - Color Changer
description: This website features a color changer application that allows users to dynamically change the background color with a simple click of a button.

name: 02 - BMI Generator
description: This website hosts a BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator tool, enabling users to calculate their BMI based on their height and weight inputs. It provides a straightforward interface for users to input their data and receive their BMI calculation instantly.

name: 03 - Digital Clock
description: This website features a simple digital clock, displaying the current time accurately. With its minimalist design, users can easily glance at the webpage to check the time in a clear and concise format.

name: 04 - Stopwatch
description: This website has a stopwatch that helps you measure time. You can start, stop, and reset it easily. It's handy for timing activities or events accurately.

name: 05 - Keyboard Check
description: This website displays the event key codes corresponding to the keys you press on your keyboard.

name: 06 - Unlimited Colors
description: This website automatically changes the background color every second, Simply start the webpage, and watch as the colors continuously cycle.

name: 07 - Match String
description: This web app lets you input a string, shuffle its characters randomly, and see if the shuffled string matches the original.

name: 08 - Your Typer Library
description: This website simulates the effect of typing text on a typewriter.

name: 09 - Mouse Circle
description: This website changes the color of the cursor based on predefined colors in an array as the cursor moves around the screen.

name: 10 - Emoji
description: This website allows users to hover their mouse over emojis to display a new emoji. When the mouse moves away, the emoji turns into grayscale.

name: 11 - Jokes
description: Have a laugh with some jokes.

name: 12 - Random Image
description: This website provides a feed of random images, offering an unpredictable and diverse visual experience with each visit.

name: 13 - Rock Paper Scissors
description: Play the classic game of Rock Paper Scissors.

name: 14 - Cats
description: This website utilizes an API to provide a feed of cat images,

name: 15 - DOM Crud
description: Perform CRUD operations on the DOM.

name: 16 - Bored?
description: Find activities to cure boredom.

name: 17 - Notes
description: Take and manage notes.

name: 18 - Countries
description: This website leverages an API to provide information about different countries, allowing users to explore and learn more about various nations around the world.

name: 19 - Songs
description: This website utilizes an unofficial JioSaavn API (https://github.com/sumitkolhe/jiosaavn-api) to enable users to search for, play, pause, and download songs.

name: 20 - Pexels
description: This client application is built using the Pexels API, allowing users to fetch and search for images from the Pexels platform.
